name: Tao Hua Yuan
description:
The story describes how a fisherman haphazardly sailed into a river in a forest made up entirely of blossoming peach trees. When he reached the end of the river, the source turned out to be a grotto. Though narrow at first, he was able to squeeze through and the passage eventually reached a peaceful village with animals and people of all ages.

There are two totally contrasting-atmosphere worlds that shows what is described in the fable, connected by the cave. The player starts his journey on a river, then goes through a cave, and finally reaches the peach blossom spring. The story begins with a dark and sad environment, and ends at a bright and happy utopia.
